decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The works to which this consent relates, must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this consent.
Condition : 2 - All new internal and external works, including works of making good, shall match the original work in both type, colour and dimensions of materials and in detailed execution.

Condition : 3 - No development shall take place until samples of the materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the hereby permitted, including brick type mortar mix and brick pointing type, have been submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

Condition : 4 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (SB_GA_001. Received: 08/07/2016. 16577/SK/01 Rev. B1, Rebuilding of Garden Wall - Sequence of Work dated - 28.09.17, Arboricultural Planning Report dated 14/10/2016. Received: 25/10/2016. SB_GA_122, SB_GA_123 Rev. A, SB_GA_124 Rev. A, SB_PH_100, Design and Access Statement Heritage Statement SB_DOC_703 updated December 2016. Received: 22/12/2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
description: Rebuilding of part of garden wall with revised coping detail. Repointing, repairs and new coping detail to part of wall.
